column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=Before I get into the bath tub , I turn on the water .
#text=I adjust the cold and the hot water to make a bearable temperature .
#text=I adjust the water before entering the tub so I wo n't burn or freeze myself .
#text=After the water is just right , I take off all my clothes and enter the tub .
#text=I pour water on my body then I lather up with either soap or shower gel .
#text=Once I have soap all over my body , I take my loofah sponge and pour soap on that as well .
#text=I , then , begin to scrub my body as firm but gently as I can .
#text=I do this to ensure that all the dirt washes off my skin .
#text=While I am scrubbing my body , I like to sing in the shower .
#text=After I scrub really good and finish singing , I pour water continuously on my body until all the soap washes off .
#text=I stay in the shower for about twenty minutes until I feel clean .
